actions.text: Measure passed Senate in lieu of H.Con.Res. 662.

official_title: Resolution authorizing the Clerk of the House to make certain corrections in H. R. 11510.

summary.text: Authorizes the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 11510, to reorganize and consolidate various functions of the Federal Government in a new Energy Research and Development Administration and in a new Nuclear Regulatory Commission in order to promote more efficient management of such functions.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing the Clerk of the House to make certain corrections in H. R. 11510.
